Hero.aboutBody: Tokyo Asset Solution is a company established in 2009 operating in real estate and investments. We specialize in reconstruction, renovation, long-term ownership and green energy projects.<0/><0/><1>Our goal is to create innovative solutions based on sustainability principles and deliver long-term value for our clients.</1>
